thread.title: Dem pushes ObamaCare coverage for illegals
thread.title_full: Dem pushes ObamaCare coverage for illegals

author: -NO AUTHOR-
title: Dem pushes ObamaCare coverage for illegals
text:
INVASION USA Dem pushes ObamaCare coverage for illegals 'Makes them eligible for subsidies if and when they file taxes – just like the rest of us' Published: 24 mins ago 
(TheHill) Congress’s most vocal immigration reformer introduced legislation Wednesday that would extend ObamaCare to the millions of people who are in the country illegally. 
Rep. Luis Gutiérrez said his bill serves both a moral and economic purpose. Invoking the recent visit of Pope Francis, the Illinois Democrat said expanding the law’s health benefits would help the nation’s most vulnerable. 
“Doing unto others as you would have them do unto you means moving forward with no restrictions on which brother and sister and neighbor we think of as ‘eligible’ or ‘deserving,’” Gutiérrez said on the House floor.
